title: Chicken and bacon club sandwich
ingredients: ['3 slices bread', '1 heaping tablespoon light mayonnaise', 'small handful shredded iceberg lettuce', '1 hard boiled egg, sliced', 'handful cooked chicken, chopped', 'a few slices onion', '1 large slice mature Cheddar cheese', '4 slices ripe tomato', '4 slices cucumber', '2 slices cooked crispy streaky bacon', 'salt and pepper to taste']
